items.sentence: Since the climate here is very mild, it seldom snows here even in the winter.
Understanding Tom's accent is as difficult as reading a doctor's handwriting.
When I entered the room, Tom was lying on the floor and his eyes were closed.
I've never met anyone who knows as much about Australian history as Tom does.
Somebody told me that today's test was identical to the one we had last year.
You're the only person that I know who likes getting up early in the morning.
Mary was a difficult child, but she has matured into a beautiful young woman.
Every day Mary took baskets full of bread to the poor and cared for the sick.
Tom suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder and is plagued by nightmares.
The sun rises in the east in the morning and sets in the west in the evening.
